text.en: Wisdom embodiment of twofold omniscience pervading the dharmadhātu,
text.en-trans: chöying künkhyab khyen nyi yeshe sem

text.en: Resplendent amidst an ocean of illusory forms in all the pure realms,
text.en-trans: dakpé zhing kün gyutrul gyatsö pal

text.en: You appeared in the form of a lord of the maṇḍala to tame the likes of me—
text.en-trans: dak sok dul chir khorlö wangchuk tsul

text.en: Jamyang Chökyi Lodrö, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: jamyang chökyi lodrö solwa deb

text.en: Khyentse Wangpo was the embodiment of the universal wisdom
text.en-trans: pak bö tenpé shingta drang yé kyi

text.en: Of countless charioteers of the teachings from the Land of Āryas and Tibet.
text.en-trans: yeshe chizuk khyentsé wangpo nyi

text.en: You were his intentional emanation, a splendour of the teachings and beings,
text.en-trans: samzhin ten drö pal du ku trul né

text.en: Praised in vajra prophecies—to you I pray.
text.en-trans: dorjé lung gi ngak la solwa deb

text.en: You were installed on the dharma throne at Katok, the true Vajra Seat,
text.en-trans: dorjé den ngö kah tok chö kyi trir

text.en: And the all-seeing Chökyi Gyatso1
text.en-trans: zhabpé kö ching künzik chö gyatsö

text.en: Invested you with the supreme vehicle’s sovereignty of the three sets of vows.
text.en-trans: dompa sum gyi tek chok gyaltab kö

text.en: To you, in whom liberating study and contemplation flourished, I pray.
text.en-trans: sen sam namtar gyé la solwa deb

text.en: You mastered all the outer and inner fields of knowledge,
text.en-trans: chinang rigpé né kün tuk su chü

text.en: And maintained a pure life of exposition, debate and composition.
text.en-trans: ché tsö tsompé dakpé namtar kyang

text.en: Source of maturing and liberating Dharma, sole charioteer
text.en-trans: mindrol chö kyi jungné ten chok gi

text.en: Of the supreme teachings, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: shingta chikpur gyur la solwa deb

text.en: You mastered the qualities of two-stage samādhi,
text.en-trans: rim nyi tingdzin yönten nga wangjor

text.en: And unlocked a treasury of mnemonic retention (dhāraṇī) and courageous eloquence.
text.en-trans: zung dang pobpé terdzö ngö su drol

text.en: You saw the secret of the sūtras and tantras, profound and vast, and gained realization.
text.en-trans: zabgyé dogyü sangwa zikpé tok

text.en: Master of upholding, propagating and gathering, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: dzin pel düpé jepor solwa deb

text.en: The teachings of the old and new Kadam, Lamdré, Marpa and Shangpa Kagyü,
text.en-trans: kadam sar nying lamdré mar shang kyi

text.en: Pacifying (Zhijé), Severance (Chöd), Jonang and Zhalu Kālacakra,
text.en-trans: kagyü zhi chö jo zhal dükhor lo

text.en: And the kama and terma of the Ancient Translations—you masterfully studied them all.
text.en-trans: ngagyur kater yongdzok lek sen ching

text.en: To you, who then disseminated them throughout the Land of Snows, I pray.
text.en-trans: gangchen khyabpar pel la solwa deb

text.en: In reality, through elimination and realization, you attained the level of an ārya.
text.en-trans: dön gyi pang tok pakpé gopang nyé

text.en: For those of limited vision, you displayed acts in accordance with the Dharma.
text.en-trans: tsur tong dzepa chö dang tünpar tön

text.en: Uninvolved in the eight worldly concerns, you untied the knots of hope and fear.
text.en-trans: chö gyé nyemdral redok düpa drol

text.en: Delusion-conquering lord of yogins, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: trulzhik naljor wangchuk solwa deb

text.en: You continually beheld the smiling faces of the deities of the Three Roots.
text.en-trans: tsa sum lha yi gyé zhal dü künzik

text.en: Through the doors of Dharma, entrustment, blessings and regular recitation,
text.en-trans: chö kyi go té jinlab gyün nyenpé

text.en: You spontaneously accomplished the twofold benefit, like a great sun
text.en-trans: dön nyi lhündrub ten drö gü selwé

text.en: Of benefit and happiness banishing troubles for the teachings and beings—to you I pray.
text.en-trans: pendé nyinjé chenpor solwa deb

text.en: When you reached the end of your ever-perfect vajra life of liberation,
text.en-trans: kunzang dorjé namtar tar sön té

text.en: You displayed your final act accompanied by wondrous signs.
text.en-trans: tamé dzepa ngotsar ché té ten

text.en: Then, once more, for the sake of the teachings and to train disciples who remained
text.en-trans: lar yang ten dang lhakmé duljé chir

text.en: You arose in a sun-like emanation—to you I pray.
text.en-trans: trulpé nyinjé char la solwa deb

text.en: By recalling your liberational life, O glorious protector guru,
text.en-trans: palgön lamé namtar jedren pé

text.en: And praying to you, may I gain the corresponding realization.
text.en-trans: solwa tab zhin dak gi ngön du gyur

text.en: May the dawning devotion of seeing all your deeds as positive
text.en-trans: chi dzé lek tong mögü kya reng kyi

text.en: Draw the sun of mind-direct transmission into my heart.
text.en-trans: gonggyü nyinjé nying la dren gyur chik

text.en: O protector, when you ultimately display the attainment of awakening,
text.en-trans: gön khyö changchub ngön nyé tsul ten tsé

text.en: May I be there among your closest heirs and hold your wisdom treasury.
text.en-trans: nyewé sé su gyur né tuk dzö dzin

text.en: Through the three means of delight, may I blend my mind with your wisdom,
text.en-trans: nyepa sum gyi tuk yi chik dré né

text.en: And may I be able to accomplish all the Gentle Protector’s enlightened deeds.
text.en-trans: jam gön dzepa tadak drub nü shok
